javavis.jip2d.util
Class WebCam

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.util.WebCam
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WebCam
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Capture a image from a webcam using the WebCam.dll.

Constructor Summary
WebCam()
          It constructs a WebCam without its values are started.
WebCam(javax.swing.JScrollPane cs, Canvas2D c)
          It constructs a WebCam with JScrollPane, Canvas2D start with the received values as parameters.
WebCam(javax.swing.JScrollPane cs, Canvas2D c, int w, int h)
          It constructs a WebCam with JScrollPane, Canvas2D, width and height start with the received values as parameters.

Constructor Detail

WebCam

public WebCam(javax.swing.JScrollPane cs,
              Canvas2D c)
It constructs a WebCam with JScrollPane, Canvas2D start with the received values as parameters.
    Input parameters:
  • cs: JScrollPane to refresh the screen.
  • c: Canvas2D where it puts the image.
    Output parameters:
  • Object of the webcam class.

WebCam

public WebCam(javax.swing.JScrollPane cs,
              Canvas2D c,
              int w,
              int h)
It constructs a WebCam with JScrollPane, Canvas2D, width and height start with the received values as parameters.
    Input parameters:
  • cs: JScrollPane to refresh the screen.
  • c: Canvas2D where it puts the image.
  • w: The width of the image.

  • h: The height of the image.

    Output parameters:
  • Object of the webcam class.

WebCam

public WebCam()
It constructs a WebCam without its values are started.
    Input parameters:
  • NONE

    Output parameters:
  • Object of the webcam class whith its members has default values.

    Output parameters:

finishWebCam

public void finishWebCam()
Finish WebCam

    Input parameters:
  • NONE
    Output parameters:
  • NONE

captureOneImage

public JIPImage captureOneImage()
Capture One Image
It calls a native method and captures only one image. The native method starts, initializes and finishes the webcam's capture.
    Input parameters:
  • NONE
    Output parameters:
  • The captured image in JIPImage format.

run

public void run()
Run
This methods is always capturing one image until the user stops it. It shows the image in the screen.
    Input parameters:
  • NONE
    Output parameters:
  • NONE
